text:
Monaize | Paris, France | Nodejs Backend Developper | REMOTE - ONSITE | https://monaize.com/

Monaize is a Bank-as-a-Service platform for SMEs in Europe. We plan to rapidly expand our business worldwide.

Our platform is currently in beta test for iOS and Android users in France.

If you like challenges in banking, cryptocurrencies and blockchain, contact us for more informations !

Skills in :

   MongoDb

   Redis

   NodeJS + Express

   Bonus: Golang/C/C++
contact [@t] monaize [d0t] com
